topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b9b77163687250d6a60500#post_54b9b77163687250d6a60500

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b9b7726368725aae830a00#post_54b9b7726368725aae830a00
Clover field was remarkable!

If you listened to the commentary apparently some of those scenes are completely improvised!

Like the part where they were running from the bridge and the camera guy trips and falls over _wasn't supposed to happen_ guy messed up but the dude got up so fast and just kept trucking!

Also I agree, they really are double edged swords, I've luckily seen most of the good ones, but Jesus those bad ones though.
